title: syntax_error
author: syntax_error
content: https://satoshi.biz.idCollect Each Letter of SATOSHI NAKAMOTO's Name & Earn Free BTC Satoshi Instant Payout To FaucetPay* This faucet requires a microwallet FaucetPay.io account to claim.

comments.author: Shark80
comments.body: No payment and looks like a scam.

comments.author: Mist3rX
comments.body: The idea is good, but there is still a lot that can be done when it comes to the implementation.For example, show the current user deposit...Create a withdraw button on the main page...Show how much you earn per click...I cant see any of my deposits are rising?!What is the "Bonus"?! Is this my deposit? Why i only can withdraw the bonus?This is very confusing...

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: syntax_error on January 21, 2023, 05:06:42 PMhttps://satoshi.biz.idCollect Each Letter of SATOSHI NAKAMOTO's Name & Earn Free BTC Satoshi Instant Payout To FaucetPay* This faucet requires a microwallet FaucetPay.io account to claim.Website gives error of "Remove ad blocker". While I am not using any ad blocker
